description: Made with a blend of responsibly sourced Merino wool and polyester, their Men’s Merino Sport 150 Hoodie offers temperature regulation, moisture management, odor control, breathability, and quick dry times. Plus, it’s designed for comfort, with flatlock seams to help prevent chafing and a fit that gives you the freedom to move. For those times when you might break a sweat even when it’s cool—did someone say a fall hike or early spring mountain bike ride?—this hoodie will leave you feeling comfortable and fresh.
name: Smartwool Active Hoodie - Mens
